website_summaries.verdict: Quality raw honey with a consistency that makes it almost like a spread. Comes with a few concerns, but overall is a good product.
pros: Thick and easy to spread on foods like biscuits and toast
cons: Comes in plastic jars that aren't sealed very well
A few owners found the label confusing, and question if it's pasteurized

customer_reviews.title: I’m surprised to see that there is no seal under ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised to see that there is no seal under the plastic lid. Also, the label gives conflicting information: on the yellow label it says “pure, unpasteurized...” but there’s an additional white label stating it’s “pasteurized”... can someone explain about it?
customer_reviews.author: Z. C.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as unpasteurized. There's a sticker on the jar thats not shown in the advertised photos, stating that the product is in fact pasteurized. Forget everything else, I give it one star just for simply being dishonest.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan     Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Family Favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This honey is unbeatable!!! Ots my family's favorite and when we run out they are devastated! Its raw, smooth, sweet, and the flavor so delicious. Other homey doesn't hold up to this one.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne dejesus

customer_reviews.title: RAW, UNFILTERED AND DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this honey. I love honey in general but this raw honey maintains its spreadable consistency at cool and warm temperatures. I use it every single morning on my sliced home baked bread and whatever the benefits are (you'll have to look them up - see below) I have a feeling of wellness. I trust this brand completely. YS ECO BEE FARMS ships promptly and I have my product in two or three days. I much prefer raw honey over fruit preserves. It's a personal choice but in my mind a wise one [...] for health benefits of raw honey.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient Activist, Aspiring Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Great For Wound/Burn Healing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this for a inexpensive wound/burn medicine, but I tried a teaspoon and realized, wow, this tastes incredible!!! I've seen great results so far, for it helping with increased granulation growth, my pressure wound on my leg. I bought the very expensive Medihoney ointment, at about $15-20 for a 1 1/2 ounce tube before realizing this blessing of a product. I figured it would have cost me about $640 for Medihoney ointment at this jars weight equivalent!!! I saved over $600!!! I will be reordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely below standards. I am a regular consumer of Honey and bought with good expectations. Issues I found 1. It tastes like Cane Jaggery white. Though I didn't test in Lab, I seriously doubt if this is 100% honey. 2. Source - it says honey from US and Canada. What does that mean?? They are not even confirming if this is from US or Canada and forget about the exact location where it is sourced. 3. High price - it is very expensive. 4. Crystal form - I never seen a honey become this much crystal or hard. From raw stage of honey, how it can be this much creamy. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Anil Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Awful taste if honey can taste old this tasted old very disgusted!!! Packing was terrible should have taken a photo. Jar was in a box with no packing material just bouncing around. Very disgusted and what’s worse not returnable
customer_reviews.author: ejg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot tea. Quality Honey
customer_reviews.text: Been using this honey for years. Best tasting honey and I find it far less messy in its solid state. If you prefer spreadable or liquid, just melt it by placing the closed jar in a bowl of hot water. Once it cools it will stay liquid and spreadable. They have the organic line as well if anybody is searching for that. Keep in mind that you get what you pay for. This goes a long way versus the generic bear. You can certainly taste the difference in quality, especially if you use it to sweeten a hot cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: DB BluBlock Productions

customer_reviews.title: No security lid
customer_reviews.text: Didnt come with a security lid, just a plastic seal outside of the bottle; it is hard as a rock and I am in warm weather and it is still hard to spoon it out. I had to warm the honey up with hot water bath... and still hard... makes me wonder if it is healthy to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra O'C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering raw honey from Canada for quite some time, but once I tasted this honey I am a new customer! The flavor is difficult to describe, but it tastes more like manuka honey than what I have been ordering for years. It has a very powerfully delicious flavor! So thankful I gave in to my curiosity and ordered it. I will order again! UPDATE: I will NOT order again! Original purchase, March, 2020. Just went in to order again, May, 2020 - the price has gone up $5.00 a jar!!! Uhm, no thank you. I'll go back to my raw honey from Canada.
customer_reviews.author: TerriJ

customer_reviews.title: Wrong items sent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and received something other than honey in the box that tracking stated it was in. I received an iPhone pop up holder, a book called The Devil May Cry and a 5 pack of BIC pens and and extra set of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, great for upper respiratory illness and good for you
customer_reviews.text: I've had Eco Bee before and already knew it was great. But when I saw this size plus, I'm sick with upper respiratory illness, I knew I had to have it. I've been eating this all day and mixing in with my tea plus lemon juice. I'll be keeping up this routine all week, probably in addition to antibiotics. This raw honey, with lemon and tea is already helping my scratchy dry throat. It's great wholesome comfort and a natural treat.
customer_reviews.author: Valmont

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Awful and unhelpful seller. Developed an allergic rash and asked to return it, he told me to pretty much get lost.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taha

customer_reviews.title: Spoon licking good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sweeten sage tea. The two are supposed to help diminish hot flashes. The flavor of this honey tastes like the flavor I remember as a kid and it doesn’t take much to sweeten tea like the local store bought honey. This is even better than the honey bears from Costco. The negative part is that I can’t stop eating it from a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Critter

customer_reviews.title: Nice textured honey and great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Ermmm well. It's not bad. It's certainly better than most honey products out there in your supermarket shelf. The pasturized white barcoded label gave me doubts so yo be on the safe side, I opted for another brand this time. I've found a more flavor full honey that smells of sweet flowers so not going with this one again. I think it's a great honey product though and great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Pinkstar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought honey from this seller for a long time--I usually get the organic honey, but decided this time to try the raw honey (which is from bees in an eco-friendly environment), and I am not disappointed! Great mild flavor, tastes delicious--I honestly look forward to using it every day!!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: IT IS UNPASTEURIZED
customer_reviews.text: For everyone saying it’s pasteurized because of the bar code label stuck onto the jar... it only says that because the title is cut off! It says “HON...pasteurized” Because the ‘un’ is cut off just like the rest of HONEY is cut off. Seriously.. the top rated comment is telling people this is pasteurized honey. Use your thinking cap and you’ll figure it out... this stuff is delicious and a great deal! Ordering my second jar now.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan P

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: I love this raw honey! Unfortunately upon receiving and opening the package that contained my last order of honey. Part of the lid of honey had completely broken off. As this is the bigger jar of honey, it has made opening/closing this product difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Candice-Lee Glutz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this quality with this price. Still, the best part is the quality, I can even feel the freshness of spring, my wife and I love to drink raw honey blended with lemon water, it’s great for your GI system and body metabolism. Second part is the deal, you can’t really find any unfiltered bee honey 3lbs for $20 anywhere, even you buy it directly from the farm that cost you $8/lb.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Broken product delivered
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before and love it. I use it so much that I ordered a larger amount this time around. Opened the box and saw all the air bags inside were broken and the lid for the honey is broken as well. Tried to go online to report damage to the product but that option isn’t available and it can’t be returned. Not too happy.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Good valve when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Good value at the price I paid, I’d recommend that you check/ compare Prices before ordering This is a raw honey so very solid, not easy to get out of the jar but that’s somewhat expected You can heat it for better “flow” but that’s defeating the idea of raw unfiltered honey I liked the flavor, very mild yet sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Review Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Best Raw honey ever, anywhere! 🍯
customer_reviews.text: YS ECO Bee Farms, Raw Honey 🍯 is the best honey I’ve ever had and the only honey I’ll ever eat or use in my tea and recipes! Real honey, healthy. The scent will astound you, no grit at all, just smooth like butter ( you will have to soften the whole jar before opening by sitting it in a bowl of very hot tap water for about 20-30 mins. Then it’s spreadable and just perfect! Yummy
customer_reviews.author: litetalker

customer_reviews.title: YS Eco Bee Farms RAW HONEY is delicious
customer_reviews.text: This YS Eco Bee Farms RAW HONEY is delicious, I love the taste of it and as long as the price doesn't get any higher, I will continue to purchase it. Full disclosure, you may need to put it in the microwave for about 30 seconds or so depending on the wattage to get it smooth but it really is a great tasting product.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Thank You! I Bee Happy! Consistency, Quality,.. and Value. A+++Honey
customer_reviews.text: Superior Honey! I've ordered from many honey producing companies and small Ma and Pa producer. All are delicious , but the folks at YS Bee Farms know what they are doing when it comes down to harvesting this liquid gold. Consistently hold true to high quality standards during whole process of extraction. This honey has always stood out from the rest. Soooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Gogreen87

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre but prevented sore throat from getting worse
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't compare well in taste to other brands I've tried but it did help me a lot with my sore throat, I added a spoonful to hot water and drank it every 2 hours. I usually just ignore sore throats until they get bothersome enough but this prevented it from getting bothersome enough in the first place
customer_reviews.author: Sanchit Batra

customer_reviews.title: Just heat it up a little!
customer_reviews.text: I love this honey! If you don't like it in it's natural state (butter like) just put it in your crock pot fill with water and put it on warm for a few hours rotating every once in a while. It will clear up and be pourable and delightful, and stay that way on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Stormbreath

customer_reviews.title: The most cost effective option for raw honey
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to create my homemade elderberry syrup and fire cider. It is DELISH. It is very difficult to spread since it is raw and unpasteurized it has kept it's more solid form. I warm it up in a bowl of hot water before dumping out the jar. The taste is incredible and it melts and incorporates into any hot beverage
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Bettinger

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best honey I have ever had. I put it in my tea and drink it every night with the hubs. It’s unfiltered, raw and organic. It doesn’t drip like regular honey, it’s so easy to scoop out. The only downside is the price, a little expensive at over $24 per bottle. Update: They keep raising their price which is awful. I’m gonna find another type of honey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great honey at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great honey at a great price. Don't buy processed honey... The companies that pastureize honey don't do it because it's better for you, they do it because it's better for them. Pasteurization kills any beneficiary properties of honey like immunization from hay fever associated with whatever flowers the bees visit and an all natural non elevating blood sugar product. They pastureize and filter honey to make it all look the same and to help prevent crystilization so, it looks better on the shelf. That's the only reason.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Haller

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a second jar of this honey. I have purchased a few different kinds of raw honey, even high end brands from thrive market and this is the best. It is very thick, think peanut butter consistency. That's how you know it's the real good stuff. That liquid syrup junk labeled raw honey in the stores is not legit.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: The best honey I ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: After trying this honey for a couple of weeks, I can say that you should try this pure and delicious honey. I totally recommend it and plus it has many benefits. Every morning I drink tea with honey, I feel like my immune system is improving. I will keep buying this honey and I recommend to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Do they really care about people's health or their wealth.
customer_reviews.text: I love this honey. I always order this brand because, it is good for you as well economical. Now since the corona virus I see that the price has sky rocketed. I feel that people are being taken advantage of because there's opportunity. I won't ever buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: quality looks different...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Y.S. raw organic honey that I purchased from vitamin store online, and I saw this product 3lb for much cheaper price. I could tell the color is totally different by glancing at it, so I read all this reviews about the unpleasant quality of darker color honey came to me. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gahyun Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good Raw Honey
customer_reviews.text: This is a reoccurring purchase for me. Use this honey for many different things from baking to home remedies. Due to the nature of this product, it is very thick so needs a bit of mixing for incorporating unless you heat. Will continue to purchase this brand. Love that I found this larger jar.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hacker

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this honey
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this honey. I am trying to eat healthier and have switched drinking 2 or 3 Monster Drinks a day to drinking Black tea with honey. The more tea & honey I drink the more I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mupuman

customer_reviews.title: Best Raw Honey anywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best honey I've ever tasted. It's not a liquid; it's straight from the hive and thick like a sweet heavenly paste. I love using it in recipes, as well as straight from the jar. I highly recommend it. It's organic, raw and absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Labeling
customer_reviews.text: Most deceptive labeling. It says unpasteurized raw honey but right at the bottom of the bottle is a white label that says the honey is pasteurized.
customer_reviews.author: joseph asuman

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Tried different honey brands over the years and this one is the best by far. Tastes great, and thick enough to use as a spread on bread, etc. without falling all over the place. Dissolves really well in tea.
customer_reviews.author: Christine P.

customer_reviews.title: Fix the labeling!
customer_reviews.text: I love this honey for a lot of reasons, but the company really needs to fix their label. The container says "unpasteurized" while the sticker indicates pasteurized. (And I'm not the first reviewer to note this, so...)
customer_reviews.author: clayoctopus

customer_reviews.title: Delicious honey
customer_reviews.text: I love this honey so much! I have been using it for years. Great flavor and it’s just one of the best I’ve had and I really enjoy honey. I sometimes wish it would come in a glass jar but then again amazon shipping kinda is at times questionable. So I don’t mind it in plastic I just transfer into jar upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Fox

customer_reviews.title: The best honey, ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best honey that I’ve tasted. Really! One teaspoon in my coffee improves the coffee. Alone it’s delicious. It’s not clear and pretty, but that’s not what I wanted. I wanted the purest honey that I could get. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Boulet

customer_reviews.title: A Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great 👍🏽 product . Eased my heartburn almost instantly ! I use it in my warm teas this summer making sure the teas are warm not hot or the beneficial enzymes / good bacteria are still alive and working . It’s a good substitute for sugar . Good for digestion just all around a great buy !
customer_reviews.author: kirtee/Mira

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This particular brand is the sweetest and tastiest that I have tried. Me and my parents love this stuff! My mom puts a tablespoon of raw honey in her and my dad's apple cider vinegar tonic every morning! If any other sweetener is used other than raw honey, my dad will not drink it! As raw honey is also antibacterial, my family and I use it for cough medicine, dressing wounds, and I sometimes use it as a face wash!
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: It says no return for this item. But it ...
customer_reviews.text: It says no return for this item. But it came with the top completely cracked and exposing the honey. The honey cannot be used.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Artino

customer_reviews.title: great tasting , yum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this honey and it last forever!. I've had mine since june and I use to constantly replace honey. Good bargain. Don't spend too much I paid 20.50. I will pay 22 or wait for price to drop. The bottle is plastic, but fine with me since you don't heat this. It has a very wide mouth! For those asking, do not heat this, it scoops out easily with a spoon and dissolves quickly
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bottle is leaking
customer_reviews.text: have bought before with no problem , this time it was leaking and when opened not full ....like lid wasnt put on straight though the plastic seal was intact......Update....got a refund same day. Bottle had little crack in bottom...love this honey will still buy it ty
customer_reviews.author: lethane

customer_reviews.title: Damn, this is DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is extremely good. This goes in my tea or on homemade bread. Yum! Note that it has a firm texture and doesn't spread easily, so don't expect liquid flowing honey. However it is well worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: css

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This honey is very good when it is fresh. I ordered this honey before and although good, when it's fresh it taste a whole lot better. I used this honey in all my teas along with ginger crystals. This is the best honey I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Cferbie

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beeat it
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering jars of this for almost two years now. Never any problems. I like the flavor and it mixes well in my tea and on toast. Keep an eye out when it is on sale or buying larger jars for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for fibromyalgia symptoms!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this and their royal jelly, I bye every month! I use them both with apple cider vinegar 3x per day really helps my fibromyalgia symptoms!! Thank you YS!!! You have given me back my life!
customer_reviews.author: A.R

customer_reviews.title: Not unpasteurized?
customer_reviews.text: Advertized as unpasteurized and the front label says unpasteurized. There is a small label on the lid which says it is pasteurized.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Love it ~ Tastes Great !
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying YS Eco Bee Farms Raw Honey and other products since 2010. The Honey always tastes great, as I use it as part of a daily ritual. I highly recommend buying the Larger Sizes, as they are very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Piscitelli

customer_reviews.title: Good quality honey
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best honey out there. I would suggest keeping it in a warmer setting, as the honey tends to dry up, making it difficult to spread/scoop out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: I put a spoonful in hot tea and it sweetens it up better than the other honey i used to buy from ...
customer_reviews.text: This honey will make you eat it out the jar as is....its delicious. I put a spoonful in hot tea and it sweetens it up better than the other honey i used to buy from super market and sugar. I love this honey and it last a long time in my house, considering i drink a cup of tea a day. I am going to order my second jar soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jisel

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: As always, I love this honey and it seems to keep allergies at bay. I deducted 1 star, because the lid was cracked and embedded in the honey. Better packaging is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ulim

customer_reviews.title: The parking is absolutely bad
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied with this product because the lead cover was broken when I received it and so I couldn’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: John Ashura

customer_reviews.title: Great honey - bad packing.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this honey, but was very disappointed with the packaging. There were no packing materials leaving the heavy jar loose in the box in the hands of the USPS. So the lid was badly damaged leaving the honey completely exposed. If not for the damage I'd rate the honey 4 stars..
customer_reviews.author: Elizakat

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE HONEY.
customer_reviews.text: I love this honey, goes well in coffee,tea, or smoothies.This is the umpteen time I've bought this brand and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite honey ever. Easily spreadable, and easy to measure for recipes. Great tasting, and I the company is easy to deal with. Had an envelope arrive empty (the jar had come out somewhere in the postal system,) and the company sent a new one no questions asked. I'll be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: The nutricion valueReplacements for orders.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great and it goes good with my oats in the morning I take back what I said. The reason being that I bought raw unpasteurized honey. I received pasteurized . Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with the bottle completely shattered due to improper packaging
customer_reviews.text: I am very familiar with this product, order it frequently. It is a superior honey with fine crystals of sugar in it and delicate taste.
customer_reviews.author: plk100rt

customer_reviews.title: How Sweet It Is
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy honey from local beef & dairy farms here in Massachusetts. However, saw this product on Amazon; thought I'd give it a try! So glad I did; this honey is absolutely incredible. Wow! Very creamy texture and the taste stayed in your mind for a while after eating it. This 🐻 is in for more!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan M. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, arrived on time, packaged in plastic jar container. Softens in microwave to spread real easy. i will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: buckeye55+

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in Honey
customer_reviews.text: The natural honey taste is perfect! I have ordered this honey over and over over the past few years, that says it all!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Requires heat to dissolve/mix
customer_reviews.text: I hv been using manuka honey tried this as it is raw organic ... and cheaper ... but u get what u pay for ... going back to manuka ... I hv to heat this product to get it to mix into my skyr yogurt and smoothies otherwise end up with chunks and inconsistent ...flavor of manuka is better as well
customer_reviews.author: denisejoy1210

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this honey! I have ordered it at least three times since discovering it last year. I use it mostly to sweeten green or black tea. I also like to spread it on toast with butter when I want a little sweetness but am not in the mood for jam.
customer_reviews.author: elb

customer_reviews.title: Real raw honey.
customer_reviews.text: This is real raw honey, so it's dense and not very spreadable, which is just it should be. This is my second jar and this time I got the bigger size because it's great quality and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyLife

customer_reviews.title: True gift
customer_reviews.text: I get scare if it runs out it is my medecine ,not a spread or other .IT truly help until it remain unpasteurized amd unfiltered, im for it.THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: aby traore

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this many times. Love this stuff! Everything from tea to homemade cosmetics & masks are made with this. Dressings to cookies & my granddaughter even claims a spoonful will cure hiccups! I feel good using this honey!
customer_reviews.author: Woodsy One

customer_reviews.title: Mmm
customer_reviews.text: Awesome raw honey!! Great taste, awesome texture. I wasn’t sure how to rate the easy to spread. It is thicker, but that’s party of the great texture. If you heat it up, it’s great with a nice bri.
customer_reviews.author: Anson Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew?
customer_reviews.text: I use this as part of my DIY Body Wash and I like it, although it took sometime getting use to, because it leaves your skin squeaky clean. I was so use to my skin feeling soft and moisturized after using regular body wash, but was my skin truly clean? Great anti-bacterial.
customer_reviews.author: TF7777

customer_reviews.title: misleading description
customer_reviews.text: the website describes product as RAW HONEY - Raw, Unfiltered, Unpasteurized, but the sticker on the can says Pasteurized
customer_reviews.author: Irina Gorin

customer_reviews.title: Plastic jars - yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Great honey but packed in plastic containers. Why would anyone go to the trouble of harvesting this wonderful honey and then putting it in plastic? Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Coonce

customer_reviews.title: Love this honey
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand for years at Whole Foods Market, so happy to find it on Amazon, The best honey I have every eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Kammasuri

customer_reviews.title: Good Flavor and Value
customer_reviews.text: Really like the process, flavor, and the great price. Would have preferred that the container was glass, but can’t have everything I guess. Could have been better packed, but no damage to container.
customer_reviews.author: LouRez

customer_reviews.title: Honey too hard
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this honey for quite sometime. I really like it. I understand that it is raw and the consistency can vary but generally speaking it has pretty much been a soft texture. However, with my last order the honey was rock hard and I was disappointed as I pretty much couldn't get it out of the jar. This has happened one other time but I just figured it was a fluke. I"m hesitant to order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch
customer_reviews.text: We've ordered this honey several times before. This last batch does not taste the same as before. Definitely not as good. I could eat it with a spoon in the past. This recent batch, it doesn't taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Allen D

customer_reviews.title: The yummiest honey
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor of the honey. Obviously it's not runny, so you'll always have to heat it up to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why this product arrived discolored. Not my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this product arrived discolored. Not my first time ordering this product, so I noticed the difference immediately and have not opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Complete ripoff. The jar must be at least 50% processed sugar because it looks and tastes that way
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Dobon

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best raw honey every and you can make the best ...
customer_reviews.text: My families and I have been eating this honey for the past 5 years. It’s the best raw honey every and you can make the best lemonade in the world with this honey. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: CCCZ

customer_reviews.title: Worst Honey ever
customer_reviews.text: I received the bottle in a good shape, but whe i tried to taste some using my small honey spoon it broke... that How hard the honey was. And it taste like suger. I have been taking honey for more than 25 years... this one is not honey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh product
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time placing an order for raw honey and they have always been consistent. I have always been very happy with their product except for this order,it looks like it’s been sitting on the shelf too long. It has this white powdery layers almost looks like mold.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: We really love the flavor and healthy properties of this honey
customer_reviews.text: We really love the flavor and healthy properties of this honey. We had some trouble getting it out of the jar -- it's pretty solid -- so I dug all of the honey out of the jar and into my stand mixer. I used the whisk attachment; in seconds, we had easily spoonable whipped honey for our tea and coffee without the dangers of heating it too high and destroying all of the honey's natural, healthy goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the honey, hate the plastic jar
customer_reviews.text: What I like: flavor, consistency, raw, fair price. I would pay more for a glass jar and wish it was in glass. That said, a lot of honey comes in plastic and this is my favorite of those. This is spreadable and nice if you don't want liquid honey in hot weather. I use it in coffee. You can cook mix for raw food treats, but I prefer more liquid honey for that.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this honey because I thought it was solid. It wasn't solid, but I was going to eat it anyway. Then I tasted it. It doesn't taste good at all. I was quite disappointed. I will never buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Langevin

customer_reviews.title: Shades of My Childhood
customer_reviews.text: This honey really is to die for! I haven't tasted honey as good as this since my childhood and that was a LONG time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Trishcuit

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I if I should order this but, after reading all of the positive reviews, I placed the order and haven't regretted it. This has such a rich taste, it puts those bear-bottle honeys to shame! Now THIS how honey is supposed to taste! Also, even though the listing shows how much you are getting, the jar is much larger than I thought. Bonus! I'll definitely be ordering again. My morning tea has never been so good.
customer_reviews.author: SteelCityWoman

customer_reviews.title: Excell
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Packaged well. Taste and consistency excellent. I use it daily using about a jar every month.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest honey. I have bought several for myself and have given some to others and they love is as well. Buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy.
customer_reviews.text: This is thick. I’ve never had honey like this, so I didn’t think I’d like it. I use it by spoonfuls. It is not spreadable.
customer_reviews.author: mark shabala

customer_reviews.title: Great taste great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow better than I expected great taste, RAW, creamy flavor, great taste, great price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Konnie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Raw Honey
customer_reviews.text: Delicious honey, and from I can tell, most definitely raw. I think the issue w/ the extra sticker (which I also had on my jar) just comes down to a very unfortunate use of ellipses. Instead of saying "raw honey unpasteurized", it reads "raw hon...pasteurized", cutting off both the "ey" in "honey" and the (very important) "un" in "unpasteurized".
customer_reviews.author: DM I.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. It is one of the best products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor, quality and cost.
customer_reviews.text: Great raw honey. Great price. It’s not spreadable - can be used on a spoon or melted into hot oatmeal, etc. Excellent flavor and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lubazh

customer_reviews.title: mislabeled
customer_reviews.text: This product is mislabeled. Info on this honey is kind of double feature. It is advertised as unpasteurized and attached white secondary label say it is pasteurized. This is rather confusing. Obviously it is honey not axle grease, but...
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 360 degree
customer_reviews.text: Excellent honey 🍯 it’s like buying from the 🐝 directly 😆
customer_reviews.author: MHG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent honey
customer_reviews.text: Beware of imitations, the honey in grocery stores that looks like syrup has all the nutrients processed out of it and is no where near as good as raw honey. Once you try it you'll be hooked. UPDATE- 4/21/20 Nothing like a bit of good old price gouging to get the country through a crisis, the price went up 50% during the corona virus outbreak. Thanks guys, I'll buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Really like it. My everyday to go.
customer_reviews.text: Best you can get with the money. Sweet. Use for my face mask too — really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: Good taste & quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good taste & quantity for price . My son likes it in milk . Working for us .
customer_reviews.author: Akanksha mehra
